about_the_game:
Welcome to Nouns Crown, the first-ever game brought to you by The Pixel Shop. Nouns Crown is a fast paced action rogue-lite that shifts form only once per day. And each day, you are challenged with a new character, abilities, weapon, and world. Battle through swarms of invading souls that seek the power of the Nouns Crown and claim the kingdom for themselves.

ONE CHARACTER, EVERY DAY, FOREVER

In Nouns Crown, every day brings a new character to life, assembled from an eclectic mix of Nouns, offering fresh gameplay and challenges each day. Coupled with procedurally generated maps, the game promises a distinct adventure every 24 hours. You will navigate through the charming world of Nouns and discover deep gameplay mechanics that keeps evolving, making every day a unique and exciting journey!

BATTLE THE INVADING SOULS

Enter the fray in a top-down bullet hell that demands agility and strategy. Nouns Crown pits you against a legion of spooky minions of varying strength and attack types. As you delve deeper into the game, prepare to face formidable bosses like "Trigger Mortis," the red death from the west, and discover new biomes and enemies. Each encounter is a test of skill, pushing you to adapt and overcome in a world brimming with dangers.

POWER UP WITH WACKY UPGRADES

Unleash the potential of your daily character with an expansive pool of upgrades. Nouns Crown offers a vast array of enhancements that unlock as you explore the sprawled out world. Discover potent synergies and craft the ultimate combination of abilities to dominate the day. Each run is an opportunity to experiment and perfect your strategy, leading you to victory against the toughest of adversaries.

BEAUTIFULLY CRAFTED PIXEL ART

Nouns Crown brings together beautifully crafted pixel art with frame-by-frame animations that evoke nostalgia while delivering fast-paced, responsive gameplay. The charm of pixel art, combined with modern special effects, creates an immersive experience that is both visually stunning and exhilarating to play.

DEMO COMING SOON

Get ready for the Nouns Crown playable demo set to launch in Summer 2024. This first glimpse into our game offers a taste of the expansive vision we have for its future, including new biomes, characters, abilities, weapons, and bosses.

short_description: Dive into Nouns Crown, a wacky rogue-lite dungeon crawler where every day brings a new character to master. Embrace the chaos as unique abilities and weapons redefine your adventure every 24 hours in your quest to protect the all-powerful Nouns Crown from the invading Souls.
